abstract.t: RFC 9489 describes Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) mechanisms for detecting data plane failures using Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping in MPLS-based Ethernet VPN (EVPN) networks. However, there is no effective OAM mechanism for detecting data plane failures in SRv6-based EVPN networks. This document proposals OAM mechanisms for SRv6-based EVPN networks.
